pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.8#Te nimium capitis sitiunt duo lumina nostri,#7#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.9#Cernere teque cupit pectoris altus amor.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.10#Nam cum tu Occiduas cmpisti tangere partes,#7#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.11#Vicinum et sensi servus amicus herum :#7#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.12#Ipse Noto levior, volucri velocior Euro,#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.13#.Mox vestros volui pronus adire pedes.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.14#Jussio me regis voto compescuit isto,#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.15#Et dedit alterius carpere callis iter.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.16#Jamque iterumque volens impune coercitus exsto,#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.17#Bisque venire parans, bisque negatur iter.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.18#Dulcia vestra mihi Gomis est eum verba profatus,#8#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.19#Seque salutare servulus audit herum :#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.20#Mox lacrymosus hiems oculorum nube reﬂuxit,#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.21#Imbreque suffudit frons peregrina genas.#5#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.22#Laetitia ergo solet tales producere fontes.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.23#Et vice conversa gaudia dant lacrymas.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.24#Hoc rogo mancipium vinclis onerate gemellis,#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.25#Brachia si nectas, non fugitivus ero.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.26#Ilis proavus vinclis et avus, pater ipse catervas#8#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.27#Nectentes, regni commeruere thronum.#4#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.28#Inde superborum plures stravere phalanges.#5#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.29#Certando et subigunt plurima regna sibi.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.30#At tu, magne puer, salveque valeque, per aevum,#8#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.31#Te dominus coeli protegat, ornet, alat.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.32#Ut patrias valeas rutilus conscendere sedes,#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.33#Atque juvante Deo sceptra tenere manu.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.34#Et sic mundani regni terrena relinquas#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.35#Culmina, ut mtherii postmodo compos eas.#6#0#0#
pg.Vol.-105.hvd.32044021109350_ocr:191.36#XXVI.#1#0#0#XXVI.
